name: rewardingly
content:

in a way that makes you feel satisfied that you have done something important or useful, or that something has been done well: It is a rewardingly complex novel that leaves you thinking over the themes long after you have finished it. Artists have rewardingly explored this side of human nature for centuries.
More examplesFewer examplesRewardingly, the last scene of the film tied together all the loose threads from the previous three hours.She had worked rewardingly with refugees from war-torn regions.The actor worked rewardingly in theatre before making a breakthrough into films.
